entries.hologram_hk47_d: This is a holographic image of HK-47. Hologram platforms like this are used as decoration throughout the galaxy. Most holograms are produced as secondary product lines by large datadisc manufacturers (like 'Corellia Digital' and 'Bay-Suwe Combine'). Unique works of holographic art are extremely rare.  Inscribed into the base is a single word "Meatbag".
